Articles.Content:
What's that?

The user below me has tried tofu.

Yes. It's disgusting.

The user below me checks the forum almost every day.

Yup, but I no longer post as I used to...

The user below me is pessimistic.

False. The cup is half full of water and half full of oxygen.

The user below me already crashed a plane into a flying rocket.

False, I'm not that "skilled"

The user below me has seen any episode of 'Game of Thrones'.

True, I have seen exactly one episode. (Just started the series)

The user below me has never broken a bone.

True. Not even a crack or a snap. And that wasn't for lack of dangerous activities...

The user below me dislikes going out of his/her/its house.

True.

Partly because of getting very badly sunburnt once and allergies.

The person below me has allergies.

Nope, Nothing

The person below me knows somebody who's pregnant.

I know someone who was pregnant recently...

The person below me likes muffins.

Meh. I prefer donuts.

The user below me has a replica of some sort.

Yes, by the looks of it, it's you.

The user below me is that Flareon from Laythe.

Yes, I was born on laythe.

The person below me is the stole the identity of danny2462!

Ehm... no.

Stealing identities is for newbies. I am creating completely new ones

The user below me was a victim of the 2013 great forum derp.

Nope

The user below me is not atheist.

False.

The user below me also feels we should digress before a religion argument comes a cropper.

Of course.

The user below me enjoys the company of animals more than people.

True. Unless I can get a girlfriend. Then it's a tied game.

The user below me has had one of their threads locked before.

true as they are at my request

the user below me has raged on a thread before

I am raging at the copy of me on this page.

The user below me has been on a ship.

True... if you count a tiny raft that used styrofoam to float.

The user below me has played and beaten Portal 2.

Yes! Twice. Brilliant game.

The user below me has played and beaten Halo 4.

Played? Yes. Beaten? Not solo. I did it co-op.

The user below me is a fan of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.

Noope.

The user below me has a pet Axolotl.

Edited May 20, 2014 by Rainbowtrout

Nope

The person below me also (Besides me, if you want to know what I meant by "Also") enjoys the company of animals more than humans (I know I do :3 )
